def_en: Masculine qualities and things relate to or are considered typical of men, in contrast to women.

def_cn: 有男子气概的;阳刚的;男子汉的
def_en: If you say that someone or something is masculine, you mean that they have qualities such as strength or confidence which are considered typical of men.

def_cn: (某些语言中的词)阳性的
def_en: In some languages, a masculine noun, pronoun, or adjective has a different form from a feminine or neuter one, or behaves in a different way.
